description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in PenciDesign Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme.This issue affects Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme: from n/a through 8.4.1.

product.name: Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme
